lead_paragraph: Reacting to the death of the Libyan dictator Muammar el-Qaddafi, India's Ministry of External Affairs said the strife in Libya and the suffering of its people had been a matter of concern and it hoped that peace and stability would soon return to Libya (The Hindu). India abstained from the vote authorizing airstrikes against Libya in the United Nations Security Council earlier this year.

headline.main: Newswallah: In the English-Language Press Friday
